channel.title: Need Help With Server Problems!
channel.description: Okay so I used to run a server way back when but I still sucked at it lolol.... but I need help, I port forwarded from my router site, i updated java jdk, i downloaded a source, but when i go to run the server, everything loads fine, but when i try to log in, it says error connecting to server.. I have no idea why it's not working.

item.title: Need Help With Server Problems!
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

u connecting from the same comp, or from a remote computer?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Server Problems!
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

It could be he didn’t change the ‘server = server.no-ip.info’ in his client.java to either localhost or 127.0.0.1. Wether you portforwarded or not, it should still let you log in with 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Server Problems!
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

This could be Many many many things. Could be that you didn’t replace 127.0.0.1 in your client.java (Only matters if u use delta or allstar) Could be you didn’t portforward correctly. What i always used was utorrent to portforward. Much much easy for me you should look it up. Anyways this could be many things, why you can’t connect. Good luck fixing it though, i wish you the best.

Read full topic
